comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: USS Florida (BB-30) was launched 12 May 1910 at the New York Navy Yard, Very similar photos of her dressed overall suggest Oct 3, 1911 (for a "Naval Review off New York") as one possible date. They can be seen at: www.maritimequest.com/warship_directory/us_navy_pages/uss... www.history.navy.mil/photos/sh-usn/usnsh-f/bb30.htm

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: since she does not have the ID number between her masts this must be the naval review if 1911, along with the other photos in this set she is saluting the president on Mayflower
